front: This tall animal has a long neck and likes munching on leaves high up in the trees!
Who is the big, stripey cat with whiskers that loves to pounce and play?
This giant animal has big ears and a long trunk and can spray water!
Who is the fast runner with spots that zooms across the savanna?
This silly creature loves bananas and swings from tree to tree!
A cute black and white bear that loves to snack on bamboo!
Who is the laughing animal known for making a "hee-hee" sound at night?
This bird with a colorful beak likes to sing and mimic sounds!
Which striped animal looks like a horse and likes to gallop on grasslands?
A grumpy reptile that loves to bask in the sun and has a toothy smile!
